title: 求教1.5.2的更多蜜蜂和神秘蜜蜂在哪有下？
author: C秋茜
txt_content: 到处找找不到啊 1.5.2的应该有的吧 MOD的话国外哪个网站最全啊？随便求更多蜜蜂和神秘蜜蜂的下载地址>w<

replies.author: lawrence03
replies.txt_content:
Extra Bees: http://extrabees.accudio.com/
Magic Bees: http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... sor-to-thaumicbees/

replies.author: C秋茜
replies.txt_content:
lawrence03 发表于 2013-8-10 00:08 
Extra Bees: http://extrabees.accudio.com/
Magic Bees: http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1627856-m ...
万分感谢 不过这个我先找到过的 完全下不了啊 难道是要翻墙么0.0
更多蜜蜂显示的是
Release Builds

Releases


Prereleases


Development Builds
